main.c

00001 //POB-Technology 2008
00002 // eeprom example
00003 #include <dual-pob.h>
00004 
00005 #include <stdio.h>
00006 
00007 int main(void)
00008 {
00009         UInt8 i;
00010         Int8 string[3];
00011         UInt8 data;
00012 
00013         //init uart0 at 19200 bauds
00014         InitUART0(19200);
00015 
00016 
00017         //write bytes to eeprom
00018         eepromWrite(0x0000, 0xAA );
00019         eepromWrite(0x0001, 0xBB );
00020         eepromWrite(0x0002, 0xCC );
00021 
00022         //read bytes from eeprom
00023         for(i=0;i<3;i++)
00024         {
00025                 data = eepromRead(0x0000);
00026                 Bin2Hex(data,string);
00027                 string[2]=' ';
00028                 SendBufferToUART0(string,3);
00029         }
00030 
00031         while(1)
00032         {
00033         }
00034 
00035         return 0;
00036 }
